Test if a named repository exists

bool ExistsRepository(
	String^ repositoryName
)
abstract ExistsRepository : 
        repositoryName : string -> bool

Parameters

repositoryName
Type: SystemString
the named repository to check

Return Value

Type: Boolean
true if the repository exists
Remarks

Test if a named repository exists. Use [M:CreateRepository(Assembly, Type)] to create a new repository and [M:GetRepository(Assembly)] to retrieve a repository.
